commitResults.messageBody:
Duke Class: add
* greet(): print user greeting
* echo(): print specified message
* exit(): print exiting message

Duke Class: add
* add(): print user greeting
* list(): print specified message
* tasks: store input as task

Duke Class: change
* decision tree if statement to switch expression

Task Class: contain information on the task

Duke Class: add
* mark(): mark specified task as done
* unmark(): change status of specified task back
            to not done
* indent(): return indentation with spaces

Duke Class: change
* header comment: capitalise header comment
                  parameter starting word
* add(): change order of parameters
* echo(): overload echo to accept array of messages
          to be printed to console at the same time

Add
* ToDo Class: contain only information on the task
* Deadline Class: contain information and the deadline
                  of the task
* Event Class: contain information and the duration
               on the task
* add(): overload method to accept arraylist and
         task object

ToDo Class: add
* Error message for empty description

Deadline Class: add
* Error message for empty description
* Error message for empty deadline

Event Class: add
* Error message for empty description
* Error message for empty start time
* Error message for empty end time

Mark/Unmark Class: add
* Error message for empty index
* Error message for index out of bound
* Error message for non integer index

Add generate method to handle exceptions for
* ToDo Class
* Deadline Class
* Event Class

Duke Class: add
* delete(): remove task from the list of tasks

DukeException Class: add error messages for delete
* Error message for empty index
* Error message for index out of bound
* Error message for non integer index

Add enums
* Command: for valid commands
* ErrorType: for valid error types

Duke Class: Add
* saveTask(): save changes made to list of tasks
              to hard disk
* loadTask(): load list of task on startup
* getTaskFile(): get path to data of saved tasks

Add load(): use saved data to create task
Add load() to:
* Task Class
* Todo Class
* Deadline Class
* Event Class

Deadline Class:
* change by String type to LocalDate type
* add behaviour to check if reached deadline

Event Class: change
* from: String type to LocalDate type
* to: String type to LocalDate type

Event Class: add behaviour to
* check if event over
* check if end time of event is before start time
  of event

Add Class
* Ui: deals with interactions with the user
* Storage: deals with saving and loading tasks
           from the file
* Parser: deals with making sense of the user command
* TaskList: contains the list of tasks

* Command: an abstract class to be inherited from
* addCommand: handles adding tasks to tasks
* deleteCommand: handles removing tasks to tasks
* markCommand: handles marking tasks as done
* unmarkCommand: handles marking tasks as not done
* listCommand: handles showing list of task
* exitCommand: handles exiting Duke

Moved method:
* add() to addCommand
* delete() to deleteCommand
* mark() to markCommand
* mark() to unmarkCommand
* list() to listCommand

Move all classes to duke paskage

Move classes to duke.command package
* Command
* addCommand
* deleteCommand
* markCommand
* unmarkCommand
* listCommand
* exitCommand

Move classes to duke.task package
* Task
* Todo
* Deadline
* Event

Rename classes
* addCommand: AddCommand
* deleteCommand: DeleteCommand
* markCommand: MarkCommand
* unmarkCommand: UnmarkCommand
* listCommand: ListCommand
* exitCommand: ExitCommand

commitResults.messageTitle: Set up gradle to build and run Duke
Add JUnit tests to test the behavior of the code
commitResults.messageBody:
Add Class:
* DukeTest: contains dummyTest
* TaskTest: tests Task methods
* TodoTest:  tests Todo methods
* DeadlineTest:  tests Deadline methods
* EventTest:  tests Event methods

commitResults.messageTitle: Tweak the code to comply with coding standard

commitResults.messageBody: Give users a way to find a task by searching for a keyword

commitResults.messageTitle: Add checkstyle Use checkstyle to detect coding style violations
Add GUI Use JavaFX to implement GUI

commitResults.messageBody:
Command class methods have void return types. These methods have
in-built methods to show responses for text ui.

Rewriting these methods to return response allows responses to be shown
on gui ui.

findCommand() uses a for loop to iterate over an arraylist to check for keyword.

Using stream to filter the tasklist for the keyword makes it easier to maintain.
Use GitHub Actions to set up Continuous Integration (CI).
Add the ability to recognize duplicate tasks being adding to TaskList.

commitResults.messageTitle: Move TaskList class to task package
commitResults.messageBody: Fixed javadoc for Command classes.

Added features:
* Highlight errors
* Tweak padding
* Tweak colors
More JUnit tests were added so that nearly all code that can be tested automatically.

commitResults.messageTitle: Choose a unique personality for Duke
commitResults.messageBody: Gave Duke a personality named Jamie. Tweaked the welcome message to include an introduction.

commitResults.messageTitle: Tweaked GUI to include colored error messages
